description:
Craft - Music Learning & Creation Craft is an intuitive music learning app designed for beginners and music enthusiasts. Explore virtual instruments, develop your rhythm skills, and compose original melodies. Key Features: Instrument Studio Play six virtual instruments including Piano, Drums, Guitar, Xylophone, Marimba, and Bells. Each instrument features authentic sound synthesis and responsive touch controls. Song Composer Create original compositions with an intuitive note-by-note interface. Select your instrument, add notes to build melodies, and save your musical creations. Rhythm Challenge Improve your timing and rhythm skills through interactive challenges. Follow visual patterns and tap along to develop your musical sense. Sound Explorer Experiment with professional audio effects including reverb, echo, and distortion. Select from curated sound packs to discover unique sonic textures. Music Journey Track your progress with detailed statistics. Unlock achievements as you play notes, create compositions, and master different instruments. Learning Features:
- Real-time audio synthesis for authentic instrument sounds
- Visual feedback for improved learning
- Progress tracking and achievement system
- Adaptive difficulty for rhythm challenges
- Intuitive interface designed for all skill levels

Introducing Match Score, the essential app for every football enthusiast. With Match Score, you can stay effortlessly connected to the world of football, accessing a wealth of information right at your fingertips. From match schedules to results, Match Score ensures you're always in the loop.

Key Features:


Upcoming Matches & Results:
Never miss a game again! Match Score provides a comprehensive schedule of all upcoming matches, allowing you to plan your viewing in advance. Additionally, you can easily check the results of past matches, keeping you up to date with the latest developments in the football world.

Favorites:
Track your favorite teams and matches with ease. Match Score's Favorites feature lets you select the teams and matches that matter most to you. Receive real-time notifications when these matches are about to start, ensuring you never miss a moment of the action.

Predictions:
Enhance your game-day experience with expert insights and predictions. Match Score offers detailed analysis and predictions for today's matches, helping you stay informed and engaged. Whether you're a casual fan or a seasoned follower, these predictions add an extra layer of excitement to your football experience.

Stay effortlessly connected to the football world with Match Score. Download the app today and make it your go-to source for all football updates and information.

app_name: Lok L0k: Watch TV drama, Movie
description:
Lok L0k — Your All-Access Pass to the World of Movies.

This ultimate movie companion is designed for film lovers who want it all — discovery, excitement, and a front-row seat to every story.

- Browse Your Way – Explore films by genre, rating, or release date, and find exactly what fits your mood.

- Never Miss a Premiere – Get instant alerts for new releases and upcoming must-see premieres.

- Your Watchlist, Your Rules – Save the titles you can’t wait to see and track the ones you’ve conquered.

- Rate & Relive – Share your take on movies and TV shows, and watch reviews from critics and fans alongside cast info and full details.

- IPTV Smart Player – Enjoy smooth, integrated playback with a built-in, smart viewing experience.

Download the app and step into a cinematic universe like never before.

Data Source Transparency

All movie and TV details — including images, ratings, and descriptions — are powered by The Movie Database (TMDB).
We use the TMDB API to bring you this rich library of content, but we are not endorsed or certified by TMDB.

Important Disclaimer

This app is an entertainment guide, not a streaming service.
We are not affiliated with, or endorsed by, any third-party content providers or film studios.
No movies or TV shows are streamed or hosted within the app.
All trademarks, copyrights, and other intellectual property remain the property of their respective owners.

HappyMood – Discover Games Made for You

Are you a true gamer looking for one place to explore everything about games? HappyMoods is your ultimate companion! With a huge database of games, you can easily search, discover, and enjoy all the details you need in one simple app.
Explore a Massive Library HappyMood Browse through a wide range of games across different styles and categories. Whether you love action, adventure, puzzle, or strategy, HappyMods brings everything together in one place.
Watch Trailers & Gameplay Before playing, get a real taste of the game! Watch trailers and gameplay videos to see exactly what the game looks like.
Save Your Favorites HappyMood Build your own personalized collection of favorite games. Add the ones you love and come back to them anytime.
Track Games You Like Never lose track of a game again. Follow the games you’re interested in and keep them organized in your list.
Choose Your Mood Not sure what to play? Select your mood and HappyMod will recommend games that match how you feel at that moment. Fun, relaxing, scary, or exciting – there’s always a game waiting for you.
Test Your Knowledge Think you know everything about games? Try our quiz and challenge yourself with fun questions to see how much of a gaming expert you are.
All-in-One Gaming Experience HappyMood makes it easy for you to discover new games, keep track of your favorites, enjoy videos, and even test your knowledge. It’s everything a gamer needs – simple, clear, and always fun.
With HappyMod, finding the perfect game has never been easier.

Key Features:

- Watch HD movie trailers anytime

This app is designed for true movie lovers who want quick access to trailers and updates without any hassle. Perfect for staying up to date with new movies and blockbusters in one place.

Listen AI: Unveiling the Power of Text-to-Speech

Turn Text into Speech and Open Your Ears to the Written Word

Listen AI isn't just a text-to-speech tool, it's your effortless companion for a world of information, narrated at your pace. Here's how Listen AI elevates your experience:

Unmatched Vocal Majesty: Immerse yourself in a variety of crystal-clear, expressive voices that blur the line between human and machine. Choose from a range of accents and personalities to find the perfect narrator for any content, be it a casual blog post or a formal report.

Customization at Your Fingertips: Tailor your listening experience to your preferences. Adjust the speaking rate to match your comprehension speed, or fine-tune the volume for optimal comfort.

Effortless Integration: Forget copy-pasting. Listen AI seamlessly converts text from documents and web pages into spoken content. Highlight a passage on a website, a section in a PDF, or an entire document, and Listen AI will bring it to life with its captivating narration.

Multitasking Masterclass: Free up your eyes and ears for other activities. Listen to articles, web pages, and PDFs while you exercise, commute, cook, or complete chores. Listen AI lets you learn and stay informed while you conquer your to-do list.

Accessibility Champion: Listen AI is a game-changer for those with visual impairments or learning disabilities. Reading lengthy documents or educational materials can be a challenge. Listen AI transforms text into an engaging audio experience, making learning and information access more accessible than ever before.

Listen AI: It's not just reading, it's experiencing.

Terms and Conditions: https://static.listenai.app/terms-conditions-en.html
Privacy Policy: https://static.listenai.app/privacy-en.html
Community Guidelines: https://static.listenai.app/community-guidelines-en.html

Get fearless, independent journalism with the Guardian app. Never miss breaking news, dive into diverse opinion pieces, and follow stories minute-by-minute with our dynamic live blogs - from world news and politics to business and sport. Get the following app exclusive features:

My Guardian - Your own custom feed of your favourite topics and writers, so you can follow the stories you care most about. 

Puzzles - Whether you're looking for classics like Soduku and Crosswords, or fun word games like Wordiply and Word wheel, we have the puzzle for you. 

Podcasts - Listen to our award-winning podcasts directly in the Guardian app. 
 
Listen to Articles - Can't read our articles? Listen to them instead. You can get realistic audio transcription of every article we publish - excluding live blogs. 

The Guardian news app is free to download and offers you a beautiful, intuitive mobile experience – so you can read, watch and listen to our independent reporting whenever and wherever it suits you. Readers have a limited number of articles, which refreshes on a regular basis. If you’re a regular reader, you might consider subscribing. Subscribing gives you full access to Guardian articles in our app, so you can read quality, international journalism with no restrictions.

And, when you subscribe, you’ll unlock:

Unlimited reading in the app, with no subscription messages
Ad-free reading, for an uninterrupted experience
Offline reading – download articles to explore on the go

What’s more, subscribing to our news app is a great way to show your support for fearless, independent Guardian journalism. As a reader-funded news organisation, we rely on your funding to power our future. Thank you.

All content in the Guardian app is copyright Guardian News & Media 2025. All rights reserved.

Our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy apply when accessing content via the Guardian app.

Privacy Policy: http://www.theguardian.com/help/privacy-policy

Since 1840 Post has been offering every insurance professional news, insight, and analysis on the current insurance developments - covering a wide range of topics including mergers and acquisitions, claims/legal developments, regulation, technological advances, emerging risks and senior staff moves. Each topic is broken down to ensure you gather as much intelligence needed to make those strategic decisions whether you work in the London/Lloyd’s or company market; for a broker, insurer or service provider; in claims or underwriting; client facing or the back office. 

The Insurance Post app provides all the content in the print edition of the magazine along with exclusive special editions only available in app format, alongside breaking news. It updates throughout the day, but also give users the ability to view articles offline, save and share favourite stories, and customise the type of content received.

Each issue of Post is available to buy via the app for £149.99. Alternatively you can purchase a 3 month auto-renewable subscription for £799.99. Please note that if you choose the auto-renewable subscription your iTunes account will be charged the renewal cost as applicable within 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period. You can manage your subscription, or cancel the auto renewal, at any time via your iTunes Account settings. If you choose to cancel then your subscription will cease at the end of the period and no refund will be given.
This app will ensure you stay informed on the key issues in the UK insurance industry at a time and place that suits you.
 
** Subscription terms and conditions
 
A one month subscription costs £899.99. Your account will be charged when you choose to purchase a subscription.
 
At the end of the one month period, and unless you choose to cancel (see below), the subscription will renew. Your account will be charged the renewal cost within 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period.
 
You may manage your subscription, or cancel the auto renewal, at any time via your iTunes Account settings. 
 
Subscription sales are final. If you choose to cancel your subscription will cease at the end of the current period - no refunds will be given.

MDLA is a new kind of fashion magazine, designed for how we consume fashion online today.

Many of us born in an online generation can only sigh in nostalgia at the glamour and wonder of print fashion magazines from the early 2000s. As the world moved online, the once iconic fashion media companies failed to evolve - they gave us lazy pdfs to browse on slow and buggy e-readers as Inst*gr*m took over to give us the fast immersive content we wanted. Their disinterest in the preservation of beauty online is clear and it’s time we had a new medium to explore and appreciate fashion for fashion’s sake. MDLA is an experiment to revive the glory of early fashion media re-imagined through powerful online media technology from present day.

MDLA Runway brings you a variety of powerful features you’d expect from a modern fashion runway viewer:

* Intuitive Interface - Flip through runway looks with a simple swipe or drag. Jump through to your favorite designer’s early years with just a tap and slide. No endless scroll, no ads, no interruptions

* Powerful Search - Search for your favorite collections down to their specific year and season. Find archive collections by your favorite designers from their early years and from labels they previously worked at. Don’t worry about typos or using shorthands - we know what you mean :)

* Lightning Fast - Browse high resolution look images from the runway loaded in a flash of a second

* Smart Boards - Generate moodboards based on any style, color or vibe even if its super descriptive. Automatically filter your favorite designer or label to collect powerful references in an instant.

* 3D Showcase - Play around with high resolution 3D captures of rare archive “grail” pieces complete with added context from its rich fashion history and references from its original collection for you to explore and learn

* Immersive Editorials - Explore our selection of hand-curated stories of iconic archive pieces, profiles of in vogue runway designers, lost fashion techniques and striking editorial campaigns

Our catalog features thousands of collections dating back to the early 90s from the most iconic names in fashion
Browse the archives from your favorite labels: Dior - Gucci - Louis Vuitton - Prada - Balenciaga - Saint Laurent - Margiela
As well as your favorite designers: Raf Simons - Rick Owens - Tom Ford - Alexander McQueen - Hedi Slimane - Virgil Abloh - Issey Miyake


MDLA is for high fashion followers, meticulous moodboard makers, archive fashion collectors, y2k fashion magazine enjoyers, small town gossip girl lovers, vintage fashion shoppers, aesthetics respecters, ‘it’ girls, clout guys, connoisseurs, hobbyists, tasteful amateurs and most importantly, you :)

app_name: Hami Book 無限暢讀真划算
description:
歡迎使用Hami Book！最多人使用過的電子書App，最多當期主流雜誌、每日報紙、暢銷好書。
不受時間、空間限制的隨身電子書閱讀服務，讓您隨時隨地利用零碎時間充電學習，提供多元型態閱讀，包含報紙/雜誌原版面閱讀、有聲書閱讀、聽書、快讀大師影音導讀、日常學影音課程，立刻掌握最新趨勢！


最多當期雜誌包括商業理財、休閒娛樂、流行時尚、語言學習、日文雜誌等等，
例如天下、商業周刊、鏡週刊、今周刊、康健、動腦、哈佛商業評論、大師輕鬆讀、ABC互動英語、
常春藤生活英語、儂儂Bella、美麗佳人、VOGUE、GQ…等180刊。

最多獨家報紙，包括自由時報、聯合報、中國時報、經濟日報、工商時報、Taipei Times等，
另有每週三更新限時下載暢銷好書。
（以上刊物統計至2025年6月30日止。詳細書刊以實際品項為主，過期刊物將不定期下架）

可從「書單」瀏覽各種報紙、雜誌、書籍清單；使用「書櫃」管理及閱讀下載的刊物；進入「好康」參與活動及獎勵；利用「快讀」迅速閱讀文章精華；「聽書」功能以耳朵聽書，隨時聆聽！

● 聰明找書(以聊天方式輸入情境與需求文字)

●連線下載紀錄支援刪除紀錄

● 離線閱讀

● 設定日夜模式
● 自訂字級大小
● 自訂螢幕亮度
● 鎖定放大倍率

The world is complex, and changing fast. The Economist app unlocks independent reporting and news analysis from correspondents across the globe. With articles, podcasts, videos and more, our app is a simple way to understand big news developments and why they matter.

Now introducing The Economist Insider, a premium video offering available at launch for subscribers to The Economist. Join senior editors as they explain what's happening now—and what comes next.

What does The Economist cover?

With expert journalists around the world, The Economist reports on politics in America and around the world, as well as economics, business, science, technology and more. We connect the dots to explain the news today and implications for tomorrow.

Why choose The Economist app?

- Read global, fact-checked news reporting anywhere
- Listen to award-winning podcasts and audio articles
- Watch videos that distill big news 

Get access to independent news reporting on your terms:

- Catch up on the news quickly with The World in Brief 
- Enjoy early access to weekly edition, ahead of print
- Download articles for offline reading

Play news games to test your knowledge:

- Mini crossword: The Economist’s wordplay news puzzle
- Dateline history quiz: guess when news extracts were published 
- Pint-sized news quiz: have you been following the latest headlines?

Enjoy additional features:

- Bookmark news articles to read later
- Give news articles to friends and family
- Read news analysis easily with adjustable text size
- Toggle dark mode

See what The Economist subscribers say:

“Great app, excellent journalism! The Economist is wonderful. The content is interesting and relevant and the reporting is superlative. Equally impressive is the drive to stay relevant by presenting media in multiple formats, from print to podcasts and short videos.”

“Impeccable journalism with an app to match. The Economist doesn’t need my endorsement of the quality of their journalism. It speaks for itself.
